revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The outlines of a new commentary on Solomon's Song, drawn by the help of instructions from the East. Containing, I. Remarks, on its General Nature. II. Observation..."
revision.text: Possibly: The outlines of a new commentary on Solomon's Song, drawn by the help of instructions from the East. Containing, I. Remarks, on its General Nature. II. Observations, on detached Places of it. III. Queries, concerning the Rest of this Poem. By the Author of Observations on divers Passages of Scripture. Corrected with Care. (Thomas Harmer). (London : Printed for J. Buckland, in Pater-Noster Row, M DCC LXVIII. [1768]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2408849~S1
